meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slightly acidic.
meanings.sent1: The subacidness of the lemon made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the subacidness of the tomato in the salad.
meanings.sent3: The subacidness of the orange juice made me scrunch up my face.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a subacidness that left a bitter aftertaste in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The subacidness of the vinegar was so strong, it felt like my taste buds were dancing.

meanings.sent1: The subacidness of the apple was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the subacidness of the yogurt in my breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The subacidness of the grapes made them taste like a mix of sweet and sour.
meanings.sent4: The subacidness of the wine added a unique twist to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The subacidness of the pineapple was a delightful surprise in the dish.
